pageContent: Context: Prostate cancer (PCa) is the second most common cancer among men worldwide. Urinary, bowel, and sexual function, as well as hormonal symptoms and health-related quality of life (HRQoL), were prioritised by patients and professionals as part of a core outcome set for localised PCa regardless of treatment type.

metaData.source:
Imaging and radiotherapy of the prostate
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10664671/
